name: Sridhan Thondu Niruvanam
briefDescription: Society For Rural Improvement And Development Of Human Action (Sridhan) Is A Voluntary, Development Oriented, Non - Governmental Social Service Organization That Has Been In The Service Of The Poor And The Marginalized Vulnerable Sections Of The Society Since 2008.  It Has Been Duly Registered As A Society Under The Tamil Nadu Societies Registration Act 1975, (Reg. No.215/2008) Government Of Tamil NaduWOMEN DEVELOPMENT :Credit Facilities through Bank Linkages SKILL DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMMES :PRODUCTIVE AND DECENT EMPLOYMENT
